summary: Mankar Camoran's Staff from The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/EMCQzBB.png[/img]
Hello, this is my second mod. This is the first of many mods that will be put in a pack that will hopefully add more rare items into the world of Skyrim.
This is a modified Staff of sparks based off of [url=http://en.uesp.net/wiki/Oblivion:Mankar_Camoran's_Staff]Mankar Camoran's Staff[/url] from Oblivion.

Location [color=#e06666](This will spoil the location of the staff! I recommend you go out and find the staff legitly!)[/color]
[spoiler]A chest inside the Shrine of Mehrunes Dagon.[/spoiler]
[color=#f1c232]Weapon Base Stats:
Damage: 0
Weight: 8
Value: 2112
Encashment: Modified Sparks enchantment 15 Base Damage

[/color]Steam Version: [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1128209982]http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1128209982[/url]
author: bigredd
